__e: - Okay, I don't know exactly what's going on, but this feels a little ambushy... and I'm not talking about the nickname that my friend Amber named her lady-poof.
My airship was ambushed and I was taken by force.
Someone thinks they can take a shot at our kin pretty soon someone else thinks they can lay in ambush, shoot at one of us.
Again, an ambush of some kind, it looks like.
I hate to say it, but this is the perfect place to ambush a drunk cop on his way home after the bar.
If our men hadn't been ambushed, then Mary wouldn't need his men, or his marriage proposal.
You want me to ambush my own client on the stand?
And ambushing my ex-boyfriend at a high school reunion seemed like such a good idea.
Among other things, someone tipped him off about the location of a prisoner transport, which allowed his men to ambush my team and kill my partner.
